website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for the multitasking individual who wants to save time and space with this functional laundry sorter.
pros: This three-bag laundry sorter simultaneously functions as a folding board and ironing board for supreme efficiency
Customers are pleased by the product's sturdy frame and wheels
Sorter holds large amounts of laundry
cons: Some customers complained of poor customer service

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that you spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The piece that hold this table in an upright position is flimsy and recently cracked on me in less than 6 months of use. I requested a replacement part (at my cost) but was informed that the warehouse does not ship replacement parts and my 30 day warranty had expired. I recommend that you spend your money elsewhere, this company has very poor customer service and the hamper is too expensive to have cracked so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A Brooks

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Does exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Does exactly as described. Assembly takes about 10 minutes but can be a little confusing for some. Will update more into usage and into the months of the year! -- **UPDATE** After using for a week+ I noticed at a certain angle the hinges of the iron board does not hold the weight of the iron board OR something is wrong with the hinges. At first noticed I tightened the screws that held the hinges but did not help. Might have received a faulty one? Will message customer service and see and update more. **UPDATE 06/28/2018** Customer service rep was fast to solve my issue as this issue was common with this product. BECAREFUL YALL!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressive overall quality.  Didn't appreciate having to go to the hardware store though...
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the general quality of the components of this laundry sorter... .very solid and overall very well made. Why the 3 stars? At this price I really don't expect to have to drive to the hardware store and track down screws and washers that didn't make it into the packaging. Additionally one of the wheels is at a angle, I presume the base was welded just a little off... doesn't affect the movement too much, but at $80 I really didn't expect any issues.
customer_reviews.author: 3Neurons

customer_reviews.title: Great except that the ironing surface scorches
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sorter for several years. I had no problems assembling and it is very sturdy. In addition, the bags have held up really well. The reason I am writing is that I used the top for the first time to iron on. The description says it is cotton, but it must not be. I was ironing cotton fabric using a pretty high heat. Cotton needs high heat to iron properly. My fabric didn't scorch, but the ironing surface scorched badly. It is now very unsightly. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SusanF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sturdy Laundry Hamper Rolling Cart with Ironing Board
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this rolling hamper and ironing board combination. It is extremely sturdy, easy to roll and the laundry bags are heavy duty and hold a lot. Just what I was looking for so that I could separate my loads and also have a shelf/ironing board on top to fold my clean clothes. The ironing board is good size. This hamper/cart is exactly as advertised, very high quality and sturdy. Definitely worth the money. I highly recommend! Great product. Not to bad to assemble, took about 45 min. with my husband and I. Helps to have 2 people put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Norberto Esteves

customer_reviews.title: This article is not listed correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and it was support to have metal mesh floor inserts. This is shown in the picture and in what the cart comes with. I have already put this together before I realized that these parts were not included in the box. On looking at the instruction that list the parts included it did not list the mesh flooring. This was misrepresented in the article. This was an expensive hamper that I could have paid less for. I would not recommend this product until the information is correct. SG
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Potentially good product that arrives with countless damage.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from my pictures, this product arrived with an unbelievable amount of damage to its parts. I don’t think it happened during shipping as the hinge arrived broken. Otherwise it seems it could be sturdy, strong and a nice product if it weren’t broken by the time it arrived. I didn’t even include pictures of all the parts that were dented or scuffed, just the worst offenders. Not ordering a replacement as there’s no guarantee it won’t be the same situation, as you can see from other reviews. Unbelievable and very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brie Van Conant

customer_reviews.title: ... I will give this 3 stars because it is nice for what it is and very sturdy the issue ...
customer_reviews.text: To start I will give this 3 stars because it is nice for what it is and very sturdy the issue we have had with this is we only recieved half of the instructions starting with step 5 we received half of the hardware necessary to put this together lucky for me I have spare screws washers etc we recieved a small wrench in the packaging and this is put together with screws only but we found the humor in all this stuff
customer_reviews.author: shawn garmany

customer_reviews.title: Solid sorter
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cart is so sturdy and the top flips open to sort. Looks great. Big minus is that we couldn’t figure out Which was the front part and it took longer to assemble. Other than that I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Seville Classics Mobile 3-Bag Laundry Hamper Sorter with Folding Table Cart
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I bring everything to the Landry-room without any effort, the wheels are rolling extremely well and in silences. The bags are great and very sturdy, and the folding table is very helpful. Just amazing things to have!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sylvain

customer_reviews.title: Works very well as a sorter and good for quick ironing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about two years ago. Works very well as a sorter and good for quick ironing. Padding isn't ask thick as a standard ironing board cover. The problem we 've had is the wheel came apart at rhe base. We've reattached it multiple times, but it is now stripped and not fixable. Other than this it has been very sturdy. It works well to keep clothes off the floor and being able to move it to access cupboards it sits near.
customer_reviews.author: J. Matt

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice enough.
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to its longevity yet as we've just assembled it now. The assembly is largely common sense, but the instructions and parts list are not the best I've seen. It seems nice though. Happy we bought it. Would like to see the instructions re-written.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3Crazies

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked everything and I love it! ❤️ Very sturdy and easy to put together. I read other reviews and thought I too was missing pieces, but NOPE! They were in a small separate bag mixed in with the trash. The only drawback is, the height isn’t adjustable, but I’m still thrilled. Hopefully I’ll love it later as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy hamper!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can use this as an iron board! No more taking out a large board to iron ONE shirt!!! This hamper is so sturdy too. Love how the wheels are so heavy duty, not flimsy or shaking when pushing the hamper around the house. I don’t have to hold my baskets EVER. I pretty much use this hamper to carry EVERYTHING. Work smarter, not harder.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tran

customer_reviews.title: I actually use it & love it!!
customer_reviews.text: As i take take items out of the dryer I just fold the on the top of the laundry rack whick is very substantially made. The bags do NOT sag like others bc the placed a floor under each bag. Its not leaning forward ( how stupid is that?) So your bags dont move unless you take the bag off. The bagsi LOVE. Nothing to not like!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a space saver
customer_reviews.text: This is as advertised... The holes where the screws go in during assembly are a bit messed up from the mfging process... So build quality is so so. Also, I initially bought this as a space saver but it actually takes up a ton more space than you get for actual clothing storage because the frame extends beyond the bags inside of it. If you're trying to save space, this isn't the tight way.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Defina

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this item was what I would expect, given the price paid - very good!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure the item would be worth the price, but seeing the other, less expensive ones and reading the reviews, I made the correct choice. This hamper is sturdy, easily moveable, has great bags that lift out easily and the ironing board is okay in a pinch. This was easy to put together, even with arthritic hands, came with all its parts, fits in laundry room perfectly, rolls silently, and handles the weight of clothes AND towels well. NO complaints and this makes me very happy - I tend to be critical of purchases - not so with this.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy space saver
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I spent a little more for this hamper because it really is a great quality, sturdy hamper. I like when I open the lid that it stays there and the doesn’t fall back down. Wheels can be locked, and hamper bags are made of canvas material which is thick. Great buy to help with organization and space saving. I got rid of my ironing board because this has an ironing board lid on it which works great. No issues at all with the hamper/ironing board.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Best Cart
customer_reviews.text: We've bought many different Laundry Carts due to leaning or falling apart... But not this one! The Seville Classics is the Limousine of all Carts. Buy it you'll like it cause I certainly do!
customer_reviews.author: ConCon

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry basket, but I found it at Costco for $60 that was the only negative. My family loves it and I can see it lasting a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: The assembly was very easy until I tried to install the last bolt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sorter after reading the reviews for a similar one that cost $30 less. This sorter is well made and well worth the additional $$. The assembly was very easy until I tried to install the last bolt. Unfortunately the threads on the frame were defective. I immediately called the customer service number and was told to send them an email with a copy of my order along with a description of the defect and the part that caused the problem. I received a reply the next day and today the part was delivered to my home. I would gladly buy another one of these but this one will probably still be around after I'm long gone!
customer_reviews.author: GHJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Hamper and Table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hamper! I had some problems assembling it, but I think that is due to my general lack of handiness. The table is sturdy and easy to flip up or down. It is also easy to get the laundry bags out. We're a family of four with two young kids. This hamper has made doing our laundry significantly more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Schonberg

customer_reviews.title: This is a great all purpose laundry sorter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all purpose laundry sorter. I use it as a folding table as well as a makeshift ironing board! The product is also extremely durable and well made. The only down side is that one of the screws was mis-threaded so I had to go out and purchase a replacement. Other than this hiccup, its a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I decided to get this laundry hamper! The ironing board top is great and it rolls around easy for vacuuming my laundry room. It's sturdy and keeps everything sorted for easy washing. I hate doing laundry and this little gem makes it that much easier and neater.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: I've bought so many hampers, always hoping to find a really great one. This is the one. Update: 18 months later, and this bag still looks new and has no wobbles. It still rolls smoothly, though not as smoothly as it originally did.
customer_reviews.author: gamgam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this laundry sorter, I didn't think about the benefit of the wheels. I wanted a way to sort, and a place to fold..I underestimated the ability to roll this thing from my closet to my bedroom to my laundry room. It has become so much more of a help on laundry day that I ever expected, and I haven't even pulled out my iron yet. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: MCW in VA

customer_reviews.title: Dual use cover is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After careful research, I chose this design due to the cover as I use it for folding more than ironing. Added bonus are a set of locking wheels! Perfect color as it blends easily into bedroom or laundry room. The three bags lift out easily and handles make carrying your laundry easy to carry. Well constructed and love the material used. Dual use cover is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: SonnyB

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Sturdy Laundry Sorter
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this laundry cart with the ironing board on top. Now I can neatly sort laundry (whereas before dirty laundry was piled on the floor) and allows me to get rid of my clumsy, awkward, full-sized ironing board. Assembly was fairly quick and easy. I spent a lot of time comparing different sorters and spent a little more money for this model - but it's a nice solid unit and is sturdy for what I will assume will be a long, useful life.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT laundy organizer
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, nice. Every product I have bought from this company is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T Register

customer_reviews.title: You should get one !
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this more than I do :) great product and easy to install. Not only does it look classy but it’s well made .
customer_reviews.author: Steven hincapie

customer_reviews.title: This is the best one because of its sturdy construction...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one because of its sturdy construction, I only wish it had a iron holder on the side. Honestly not sure why someone would design an ironing board type product and not have someplace to put the iron, to me that's like designing a car without seats.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Nice sorting system but poorly built bags
customer_reviews.text: The product looks as described. After only 2 weeks of use the seams between the mesh and the white part of the bag are falling apart so there are wholes in the bags now.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Wellock

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Control.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the 3-Bag Sorter with the lid. Generally, I would say this product is not sturdy and not well made; the screw inserts are spot welded shoddily (one was bent back, making it difficult to screw in the bolt). It was missing a screw insert, which made it impossible to attach the lid properly. It was also missing a washer and had an extra bolt. The lid hinge is cheap and the wheels are as well. I realize that $79.99 will not net a industrial-grade laundry sorter. But is should not net you a piece of junk, either.
customer_reviews.author: Theoryhead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for Someone with Limited Mobility
customer_reviews.text: I am an elderly person with limited mobility. This laundry sorter is a great help and is easily wheeled from bedroom to utility room. After clothes are washed, it serves as a clean clothes sorter and the flat, cloth covered top provides a place for folding. This sorter is frankly beyond my expectations for the price. I'd recommend it to anyone for who carrying a laundry basket is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: AJWall

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS WHATSOEVER - NICE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome laundry cart. Very functional for everyday use. Easy to assemble and maneuvers easily. Wheels can be locked if you choose to do so. Great quality and much needed item. No regrets at all. Highly recommend. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Love

customer_reviews.title: durable and strong....
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, very durable and strong. The wheels are nice and big, easy to roll in-and-out of the closet, right into the Laundry room. I had some initial issues due to a damaged box during shipping so gave it 1 star, I have since revised my rating to 4 stars. The manufacturer (Seville) responded back immediately to my email, they are sending replacement parts .. Satisfied customer...
customer_reviews.author: Nav Chopra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction and quality. The wheels do lock making it stable. The covered top is great for quick ironing tough ups and some extra space for folding items out of the dryer. Bag size meets our expectations, we use this mainly for bath and kitchen towels. Bag color matches photos shown.
customer_reviews.author: R.Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and Strong.....I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of the wobbly wheeled laundry sorters I could buy locally. I splurged and ordered this sorter from Amazon......little did I know, until I saw the quality of this piece, that I've saved myself money over time. This will be the last laundry sorter anyone should ever need to purchase. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jo Willow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy laundry sorter, good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This laundry sorter is nice and sturdy. Assembly was pretty easy, except for attaching the plastic part the ironing board rests on. If you don't have a skinny screwdriver you will have a hard time installing it. They should have included an allen wrench to install that piece. Other than that, installation was easy. So far it is holding up well, I assembled it less than a week ago. I use the ironing board as a folding table, works great for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Chemists

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for, it is the right size for my laundry room. I love the top, I use it to fold clothes. I have not tried it as an ironing board.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: No regrets, amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was a beast to put together! Instructions were horrible... I offered the plumber an extra $10.00 to tell me what I was doing wrong, (he felt sorry for me.) He broke a portion of it down twice. But I love it. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about buying this because of the price but I'm glad I took the leap and bought it. I'm not disappointed and everyone in my household loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Trust me

customer_reviews.title: Laundry bags are easy to remove to dump clothes into the washer.
customer_reviews.text: I like the durable bags. I like the size of the casters. I like that the wheels lock. I like table that I use for folding clothes. I like the convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: I love this laundry bin/table
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry bin/table!!! It holds all of my family of five's laundry (including all of our towels). It is very sturdy and can be wheeled around with ease. The top is perfect for folding clothes (I don't iron so haven't used it for that). It doesn't take up a lot of space either (which is a plus since I don't have a huge laundry room). My mother now wants me to order her one since she likes mine so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry sorter
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 6 months now and I really love it. It is heavy duty and holds a lot of laundry. My only complaint was the screws that attached the brackets on top were stripped; I called customer service and they shipped a new one which is fine-I do think they waited to ship until the warranty was about to expire though and I had to make several contacts before it was shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use the folding table as an ironing board to save space. Update: I've had it for about a year now still works great and is very sturdy. When I was originally looking for a laundry hamper I didnt want to spend as much as I did but the cheaper ones really looked cheap. This was definitely worth the extra $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Holub

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s much better than expected. Assembly was difficult for me as I’ve never assembled anything. But even I was able to do it. So must be a breeze for most of people. Very sturdy, maneuver well, and the fabric on both the ironing board and bags are good.
customer_reviews.author: Kaija

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I researched so many of these things, and WOW, this one has got to be the best! It's so lightweight, and just absolutely wonderful! Even I can push it to another room when full of clothes. Can't say enough good things about it, other than you won't be sorry that you bought it...and you'll wonder what took you so long!
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality laundry sorter
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice laundry sorter. It was a little tricky to put together but handy to have. I only wish I could take the fabric cover off to wash it occasionally. I covered it with a table cloth to protect it and make it look a little nicer in the spare room.
customer_reviews.author: JJB335

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flimsy and ironing board cannot bear load. Wheels don't lock do the entire trolley moves while one tries to iron. Alignment is completely off do the unit constantly rocks. Packing box was totally disintegrated upon arrival, so a return was not possible. Some plastic posts do not align with the trolly. No tools for assembly were included.
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, functional lift-up folding table!
customer_reviews.text: Love having a lift-up folding table on top! Just what we needed for our laundry needs. Very sturdy and moves easily! Great product.
customer_reviews.author:
Unknown

Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great laundry sorter. Large enough to hold a full load in each bag. The hinged top is great and can double as an ironing platform. There is not much clearance between the folding table and the bags so I usually have to flip the folding table up to sort my dirty laundry. My sorter is in my laundry room on a solid surface floor. The locking wheels aren't sturdy enough to keep the sorter anchored, but it's not a major inconvenience. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: K's Mom

customer_reviews.title: What I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. It is very sturdy, has a nice folding table/ironing board on top. It rolls so I can move it where I need easily. I Love It!
customer_reviews.author: LRE

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my laundry room
customer_reviews.text: Besides the ability to sort laundry, what's nice about this cart is that you can just lift the bags out and dump the laundry into the washer. The top is nicely padded so you can use it for ironing smaller items, i.e. tops, shorts, etc... Very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for hall closet, measured but it's large front to back. Great quality...sturdy,functional, doesn't tip. Bags remove easy. Great sorting guide for 7yo. Now if only husband would comply on sorting.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi T

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I really like the product
customer_reviews.text: Very HEAVY moth ball smell. Other than that I really like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dale

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about 9 months. It’s great. Easy to put together. Certainly makes our laundry room easier to maneuver. I love that it has the ironing board attached. Would recommend this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: NYCNOR

customer_reviews.title: Using as a recycle station and the cat agrees
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. We insert trash bags in each sorter bag then use it as a 3-way recycle bin center for cans, plastic and bottles and it works well for our needs. The cat loves to lay down on the ironing board flip lid!
customer_reviews.author: HappyHeathen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything organized before the wash and the folding/ironing station on top is great for stacking up the clean laundry
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver in the laundry room. Keeps everything organized before the wash and the folding/ironing station on top is great for stacking up the clean laundry. Sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mollee Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have a big house!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cus it had the best reviews and also thinking it would save me some space....wrong this thing is good and sturdy but it's big I had to give it away :(
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Alcazar

customer_reviews.title: holds a ton of laundry.
customer_reviews.text: looks clean, moves easily. holds a ton of clothes. upgrade from my previous basket. happy w/ purchase.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great Laundry Sorter
customer_reviews.text: We have you been all my life? My laundry is in the basement and I used to have to lug a full basket down there. Now I just have to grab on of these bags. It is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: shcommish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laundry nook hamper
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product overall. Love it! Easy to assemble and sturdy. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: A perfect storage folding laundry bag and ironing table for a ...
customer_reviews.text: A perfect storage folding laundry bag and ironing table for a lesser space or room in the house or apartment.
customer_reviews.author: King of The Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Great hamper but part of it came defective & dented.
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to receive this and just started to put it together but one of the screw holes in the metal right panel wasn't punctured so I couldn't add the bar across the back that helps hold the bags in place, and the metal was dented. Had to purchase tools and use some serious elbow grease to puncture a hole in the metal so I could put it together.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cart
customer_reviews.text: The champagne metal finish is particularly pretty I did not want the shiny silver look. This is as sophisticated a laundry cart as I've ever seen. Definitely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JERHLS

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and rolls well
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and rolls well. I like that the handles are not attached to the bags with Velcro. Some of the other carts out there use Velcro to attach the bag handles and that sometimes would snare my laundry. The ironing board opens nicely and has resistance (so it doesn't' slam shut if you don't open it the whole way). Worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best things I've ever purchased for my house
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I've ever purchased for my house. It has made doing laundry for my partner and three kids so much easier and less chaotic. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: TeeForTwo

customer_reviews.title: Nice hamper.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy hamper system with easy rolling wheels. Padded tilting ironing board makes for a nice touch. Looked at cheaper models but like the adage says...you get what you pay for. Large capacity canvas bins.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Texas

customer_reviews.title: the color it just like you see in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Its high quality and moves real fast and smooth. the color it just like you see in the picture.its easy to set up.and feels strong
customer_reviews.author: Israelite issachar

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: We had another brand of laundry sorter that cost around 36.00 on Amazon but it fell apart after 3 years. This one is really sturdy and was easy to put together. Proving once again that you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for 5 years. This product is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my laundry room. I even put it together myself.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a small laundry room or closet. Large enough to hold plenty of clothes. Very durable. The wheels make it easy to move around if needed. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than other brands!!
customer_reviews.text: We broke through two similar products before doing more research and getting this product - it has lasted a while now and shows no sign of wear and tear or getting weak at the joints. MUCH sturdier!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice but pieces were not very good
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it is durable but. The screws they gave me were to small so I had to use my own. Also wasn't square so had to unscrew one of the legs half way to make it level. Wasn't enough to make me go through the hassle of sending it back but I probably should have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic if you're short on space like we are
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic if you're short on space like we are. There's also enough space on the top to sort and fold a decent sized load.
customer_reviews.author: Claire A.

customer_reviews.title: it is awkward to assemble alone and the pictures aren't that clear
customer_reviews.text: Nice once I got it together. Get a partner to help hold the pieces and make sure you have all the parts facing the right way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A quality hamper for your home

customer_reviews.title: Best Seville Laundry Sorter
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is a bit pricey, but it's great. You can definitely tell the quality of the product and it only took me about 30mins to set up. The folding table on top is a plus. I have a small room and having this really does help. I highly recommend it for the quality, size, and usefulness. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: I got the product today and so far so good. The assembly instructions were a bit confusing
customer_reviews.text: I got the product today and so far so good. The assembly instructions were a bit confusing, but I was able to figure it out. The bags are a good size and look like it'll fit a medium to large load of laundry in them. It's heavy duty and seems very sturdy. I just wish it came in a different color.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of expensive for what it is but we love it. Saves space as we don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive for what it is but we love it. Saves space as we don't have to keep an ironing board around now and this is multi functional :)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Very sturdy. A lot better than the $40 one I had gotten at walmart before which only lasted 1 month before it started getting lose on all the joints. This one has held together well in that same amount of time. I roll it over carpet alot which is where I would expect it to have a hard time and to start becoming loose and wobbly, but it has not. My wife and I both love this replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: it made me think how used I have become to other bad quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of the product, it made me think how used I have become to other bad quality stuff. Worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearance, strong build but lack luster wheel locks...
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered and received this item. Looks great, the product seems to be nicely built and supportive. The assembly is simple and only takes about 10 minutes. However, the wheel locks don't work at all. Even with the brakes on it will move around whenever removing laundry bags or using the folding table. I think they would've functioned better had all wheels contained the brakes. Overall the product looks nice and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. Very well made, easy to assemble, rolls easily, nice top for folding clothes. Very happy with this.

product_meta.title: Seville Classics Mobile 3-Bag Laundry Hamper Sorter with Folding Table Cart, Champagne Gold
product_meta.description: Keep your lights, darks, delicates and linens separate with the Seville Classics Deluxe 3-Bag Laundry Hamper Sorter Cart with Folding Table. The lightweight table lifts up for convenient bag removal; it features cotton fabric cover with polyester-foam padding. Use the space to fold freshly laundered linens and clothes, or as a table for pressing wrinkled slacks, pants, shorts, and shirts. Bags are constructed from heavy-duty, machine-washable 100% polyester canvas and provide about 1. 5 cu. ft. of space each. Simply throw the bag into the wash when it's ready! Each bag features dual steel-wire handles dipped in soft-grip material. The base features three steel mesh panels that prevent the bags from sagging when overfull. Swivel wheels allow the cart to move easily; two lock for stability when you need it to stay put. Use it your way: organize colors and whites easily in your bedroom or laundry room; store it in a closet to keep dirty clothes out of sight; roll it from room-to-room when it's time to gather bed sheets and blankets; carry the bags to the laundry mat or the dry cleaners. 100% polyester bags in natural white Lift-up table features a heat-resistant cotton-canvas cover cushioned with polyester-foam padding Iron mesh folding table High-strength oval tube frame provides stability in motion and at rest; champagne epoxy finish Angled steel-wire bag handles coated in champagne soft-grip material Three mesh support panels prevent bags from sagging, stopping premature wear and tear Large, curved handles can be held easily with the folding table down or up Four 3-inch wheels glide easily; two lock when needed Easy assembly with necessary tools included Dimensions: 31. 2" W x 18. 3" D x 36. 7" H Bag dimensions: 14" W x 8. 5" D x 23" H Volume: 1. 3 bushels or 1. 6 cu. ft. per bag Weight capacity: 10 lbs. per bag Weight: 23 lbs. Model #: WEB182
feature_bullets: SPACE-SAVING FOLDING TABLE - Lift-up folding table features a heat-resistant cotton cover with poly-foam padding pulled over an iron wire mesh; conveniently press shirts, slacks and more.
LIFT-OUT LAUNDRY BAGS - Includes 3 durable polyester bags with soft-grip handles capable of holding up to 1. 5 cu. ft. of laundry or up to 10 lbs. each.

STURDY METAL FRAME - Premium oval tube design in champagne gold blends contemporary style with extreme strength; 3 mesh panels along the base provide support for full bags, preventing wear and tear from sagging.
ROLLING DESIGN - Tall, angled cart handles make the cart easy to push and pull; 3-inch PVC wheels with metal hardware (two locking) provide smooth-gliding mobility.
CONVENIENT SIZE - Sorter Dimensions: 31. 2" W x 18. 3" D x 36. 7" H; Bag Dimensions: 14" W x 28. 5" D x 3" H

specifications.Warranty Description: Limited 1-year manufacturer's warranty - seville classics product is backed by a 1-year limited warranty unless otherwise specified. The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the duration of the warranty period.
